content.1: In the third year of the reign of king Belshazzar a vision appeared unto me,
content.2: And I saw in a vision; and it came to pass, when I saw, that I
content.3: Then I lifted up mine eyes, and saw, and, behold, there stood before the river a ram which had
content.4: I saw the ram pushing westward, and northward, and southward; so that no beasts might stand before him, neither
content.5: And as I was considering, behold, an he goat came from the west on the face of the whole earth, and touched not the ground: and the goat
content.6: And he came to the ram that had
content.7: And I saw him come close unto the ram, and he was moved with choler against him, and smote the ram, and brake his two horns: and there was no power in the ram to stand before him, but he cast him down to the ground, and stamped upon him: and there was none that could deliver the ram out of his hand.
content.8: Therefore the he goat waxed very great: and when he was strong, the great horn was broken; and for it came up four notable ones toward the four winds of heaven.
content.9: And out of one of them came forth a little horn, which waxed exceeding great, toward the south, and toward the east, and toward the pleasant
content.13: Then I heard one saint speaking, and another saint said unto that certain
content.14: And he said unto me, Unto two thousand and three hundred days; then shall the sanctuary be cleansed.

content.17: So he came near where I stood: and when he came, I was afraid, and fell upon my face: but he said unto me, Understand, O son of man: for at the time of the end
content.18: Now as he was speaking with me, I was in a deep sleep on my face toward the ground: but he touched me, and set me upright.
content.19: And he said, Behold, I will make thee know what shall be in the last end of the indignation: for at the time appointed the end

content.22: Now that being broken, whereas four stood up for it, four kingdoms shall stand up out of the nation, but not in his power.
content.23: And in the latter time of their kingdom, when the transgressors are come to the full, a king of fierce countenance, and understanding dark sentences, shall stand up.
content.24: And his power shall be mighty, but not by his own power: and he shall destroy wonderfully, and shall prosper, and practise, and shall destroy the mighty and the holy people.
